column1: Baby Barnaby's////NOM! We waited here for about 30m in the hot humid weather
column2: and then got sat in the patio on which it started to rain. It was covered
column3: but we were still getting wet from a small leak in the metal patio roof
column4: but nothing could distract me from the tastiness of the food. My green eggs breakfast plate was delicious
column6: hello golden perfectly cooked potatoes! And to top it off
column7: the buttermilk waffle of glory! I'd go back. The menu is small but perfect
column9: prepare to sweat a bit since the waiting area is outdoors. The food came out fast and hot. Looking forward to going back!
